text: Driveclub is a racing video game published by Sony Computer Entertainment. It was developed by Evolution Studios for the PlayStation 4. Driveclub was officially announced during the PlayStation 4 press conference on 20 February 2013. The game was released on 7 October 2014. ==References== Category:2014 video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation VR games Category:Racing video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games
title: Driveclub
